attributes.action: Rescind the Recent rail order given to Hitachi and preserve more UK manufacturing jobs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain has a reoutation for Engineering excellence that few countries can actually better, even  though they may claim to. We must get back to added value manufacturing because we need the sector to thrive to preserve our economy after the mishandling of the financial crisis by this incompetent government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
